definition: to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)

sentences.english: Vacuums can a healthy, labor-saving grooming tool.
sentences.chinese: 吸尘器是一种健康省力的梳洗工具。

sentences.english: The blade of groove is designed as sawtooth, saving effort and durable.
sentences.chinese: 槽刀采用锯齿形设计刀片，省力耐用。

sentences.english: Cooking in a microwave oven takes less time and energy.
sentences.chinese: 用微波炉烹调，省时省力。

sentences.english: A washing - machine is a saver of time and strength.
sentences.chinese: 洗衣机是一种省时省力的机械。

sentences.english: Save time and effort by having the movers come to you.
sentences.chinese: 让搬运公司的人自动找上门来可以省时省力。

sentences.english: The knife blade angle is small, when cutting labor.
sentences.chinese: 现有菜刀的刀刃角度较小，切菜时省力。

sentences.english: Adopted push-draw style double working tables print quickly.
sentences.chinese: 采用双台面推拉工作台操作省力，承印速度快。

sentences.english: Rebuilding to also preferably re- fabricate one again is extra labor-saving, this is also the empress words.
sentences.chinese: 重修也不如再重新建造一个更为省力，这也是后话了。

sentences.english: But we should choose the right path, not just the easy path.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该选择正确的道路，而非省力之途。

sentences.english: The utility model has the advantages of simple structure, labour-saving and time-saving installation;
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型的优点是结构简单，安装省时省力。

sentences.english: Invention of a forging hammer helped a lot.
sentences.chinese: 锻造锤的发明让他们省力不少。

sentences.english: Labor-saving machines will give Americans more free time.
sentences.chinese: 省力机械会给美国人更多的自由时间。

sentences.english: The device has simple transportation and operation methods and saves labor and time.
sentences.chinese: 该装置运输和操作方法简便，省时省力。

sentences.english: The fixed pulley only changes the direction of the force, it cannot help reduce effort.
sentences.chinese: 定滑轮并不能省力，只是改变了力的方向。

sentences.english: The work platform plate adopts a push-pull type for less operational efforts and faster printing speed.
sentences.chinese: 采用推拉式工作台面，操作省力，承印速度快。

definition: to cause no trouble/to be spared worry/worry-free
troublesome/to take a lot of trouble to do sth
to expend a great deal of effort
to omit/to dispense with/to make unnecesary/to save (time, trouble etc)
erhua variant of 費勁|费劲[fei4 jin4]
